data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Edineţ, Moldova so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Edineţ, Moldova

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Edineţ.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 21 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 3,320 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Edineţ do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Edineţ to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Edineţ, Moldova. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 3,320 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Edineţ, Moldova has a population of 71,900.

We estimate Edineţ has 3,320 people who might know Jesus, 50,949 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,630 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.
